DOC.brief_summary: The investigators compare the treatment results and clicical presentations of different Molecular subtyping of Treponema pallidum
DOC.brief_title: The Association Between Molecular Typing of Treponema Pallidum and Treatment Efficacy and Clinical Findings
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria 1. Persons with confirmed early symptomatic syphilis (primary or secondary) or hightiter latent syphilis 1. Pregnant woman 2. Known allergy to penicillin 3. RPR titers were found to be 1:8 or less
